error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect. Check your network or increase the HTTP/WebSocket timeouts in setup or Options, then try again.
error.ws_timeout: WebSocket login timeout. HTTP: {http_ms}ms, WS handshake: {ws_handshake_ms}ms, Login wait: {login_wait_ms}ms. Check logs for full diagnostics.
error.invalid_auth: Invalid email or password. Please check your credentials.
error.no_devices: No FanSync devices found on your account. Please verify devices are registered in the Fanimation app.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please check the logs for details.

init.title: FanSync Options
init.description: Configure fallback polling and network timeouts
